references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper is the foundation for the video generation method used in LeviTor, providing the core technology for image-to-video synthesis.
This paper introduces the concept of video diffusion models, which LeviTor builds upon to achieve high-quality video generation.
This paper introduces SAM, a foundation model for object segmentation which is crucial for generating object masks used in LeviTor's 3D trajectory control.

references.paper_title: Draganything: Motion control for anything using entity representation
references.reason: This paper is directly compared with LeviTor as a leading method for 2D trajectory control in image-to-video synthesis.

references.paper_title: DragNUWA: Fine-grained control in video generation by integrating text, image, and trajectory
references.reason: This paper is another key comparison for LeviTor, representing a state-of-the-art approach for video generation with trajectory control.
